name: azure-devops-workitem-doc-generator
description: In order to debug you have to run a local web server with https

scripts.build-package-production: npx webpack && npx tfx-cli extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version
scripts.build-package-dev: npx webpack && npx tfx-cli extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file vss-extension.dev.json --rev-version
